targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, pod) (rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/cortex-gw", route="api_(v1|prom)_push"}[$__interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, pod) (rate(cortex_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job=~"($namespace)/(ingester|cortex$)", route="/cortex.Ingester/Push"}[$__interval])))
